variable.name: family
variable.description: Family ID

variable.name: baby_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID of child.
variable.comment: De-identified ID.

variable.name: site
variable.description: Data collection site.

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Child's gender.

variable.name: premie
variable.description: Case/control status (preterm vs. term delivery).
variable.value: Child delivered at 37-42 weeks gestational age
Child delivered prematurely (20-36 weeks gestational age)

variable.name: apgar_1
variable.description: Child's APGAR score at 1 minute.

variable.name: apgar_5
variable.description: Child's APGAR score at 5 minutes.

variable.name: birthweight
variable.description: Child's weight at birth.

variable.name: br_dil
variable.description: Child needed bronchodilators for more than one week.

variable.name: ct_dur
variable.description: Duration of chest tube drainage from child.

variable.name: dcO2
variable.description: Child discharged on oxygen.

variable.name: dcvent
variable.description: Child discharged on ventilator.

variable.name: deceased
variable.description: Child death.
variable.comment: Child died during hospital stay.

variable.name: site4/5_delivery
variable.description: Delivery route.

variable.name: diuretics
variable.description: Child needed diuretics for more than one week.

variable.name: ecmo
variable.description: Child was on extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) at some point.

variable.name: fam_pre
variable.description: Family history of prematurity.
variable.comment: Mother has previously given birth to a baby of less than 37 weeks gestational age.

variable.name: fam_rds
variable.description: Family history of respiratory distress syndrome.
variable.comment: Mother is aware if any of this infant's siblings (by same birth mother) received significant form of supplemental oxygen after birth.

variable.name: fam_rs_dx
variable.description: Family history of other respiratory disease.
variable.comment: Whether any members of the immediate family suffer from any form of significant lung disease.

variable.name: fio2_1wk
variable.description: Percent oxygen required by child at one week.
variable.comment: Percent oxygen required when infant is one week old. Room air FiO2 value is 0.21.

variable.name: fio2_24
variable.description: Percent oxygen required by child at 24 hrs.
variable.comment: Percent of oxygen child was on approximately 24 hours after receiving the first dose of surfactant. If the child did not receive surfactant but still had RDS, this is the percent of oxygen 24 hours post admission. Room air FiO2 value is 0.21.

variable.name: fiO2_i
variable.description: Initial percent oxygen required by child.
variable.comment: Percent of oxygen the child was on at time of admission to a hospital. Room air FiO2 value is 0.21.

variable.name: gaweek
variable.description: Estimated gestational age.

variable.name: site5_labor
variable.description: Type of labor.
variable.comment: Whether there was any type of labor (spontaneous or induced). Induction of labor prior to a vaginal delivery coded as 'yes'. Variable only coded as 'no' if the patient had a scheduled C-section and was not in labor at the time of this procedure.

variable.name: length_stay
variable.description: Child's length of stay in hospital.
variable.comment: Length of stay in hospital, calculated from admission date and discharge date. The date of admission is counted as a day; however the date of discharge is not. Admission date is the date the patient first entered a hospital for this stay.

variable.name: map_1wk
variable.description: Child's mean airway pressure at 1 week.
variable.comment: Measured at 7 days post-birth. Children on some form of nasal cannula assigned a MAP (mean airway pressure) value of 4.

variable.name: map_24
variable.description: Child's mean airway pressure at 24 hrs.
variable.comment: The settings the child was on approximately 24 hours after receiving the first dose of surfactant. If the child did not receive surfactant but is still an RDS case, this is the setting 24 hours post the admission settings. Children on some form of nasal cannula assigned a MAP (mean airway pressure) value of 4.

variable.name: map_i
variable.description: Child's initial mean airway pressure.
variable.comment: Value at time of admission to a hospital.

variable.name: maternal_age
variable.description: Maternal age at time of delivery.

variable.name: site1/5/6_iddm
variable.description: Mother diagnosed with insulin dependent diabetes mellitus.
variable.comment: Includes gestational and chronic diabetes.

variable.name: pre_ster
variable.description: Mother received a full course of steroids prior to delivery.
variable.comment: Two administrations 24 hours apart, at least 24 hours prior to delivery constitutes a full dose.

variable.name: ncpap
variable.description: Number of days child is on nasal cpap.

variable.name: num_fetus
variable.description: Number of fetuses.
variable.comment: This is the original number of fetuses prior to any reduction or fetal demise.

variable.name: O2_dur
variable.description: Number of days child is on oxygen.

variable.name: late_RDS_age
variable.description: Age at onset of respiratory symptoms in months for late respiratory distress syndrome category only.

variable.name: pa02_1wk
variable.description: Child's arterial oxygen level at 1 week.
variable.comment: Measured at 7 days. Value ascertained from arterial blood gas.

variable.name: pa02_24
variable.description: Child's arterial oxygen level at 24 hrs.
variable.comment: Measured approximately 24 hours after receiving the first dose of surfactant. If the child did not receive surfactant but is still an RDS case, this is the measurement 24 hours after the admission settings. Value ascertained from arterial blood gas.

variable.name: paO2_i
variable.description: Child's initial arterial oxygen level.
variable.comment: Value at time of admission to a hospital.

variable.name: pat_age
variable.description: Paternal age at time of delivery.
variable.comment: Father's age found in the birth certificate or ascertained by asking mother of child for this information.

variable.name: ptx
variable.description: Child diagnosed with pneumothorax upon discharge.

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of child, recorded as same as mother's

variable.name: resp_dx1
variable.description: Respiratory diagnosis 1 (presence of respiratory distress syndrome).
variable.comment: Whether or not the child was diagnosed with RDS at the time of discharge. The child was diagnosed if he/she met the VON criteria for RDS or if doctor noted RDS/HMD in the chart.

variable.name: respdx_2
variable.description: Respiratory diagnosis 2.
variable.comment: Respiratory diagnoses other than respiratory distress syndrome.

variable.name: respdx_3
variable.description: Respiratory diagnosis 3.
variable.comment: Respiratory diagnoses other than respiratory distress syndrome.

variable.name: steroids
variable.description: Child needed steroids for more than 1 week.

variable.name: surf_num
variable.description: Number of surfactant doses given to child.

variable.name: vent_dur
variable.description: Number of days child was on ventilator.
